mapper.select:
select
from tbl_lock l,tbl_vehicle c where l.vehicle_id=c.id and is_has_bind = 1

select
from tbl_lock l,tbl_vehicle c where l.vehicle_id=c.id and l.lock_device_id=#{lockId} and is_has_bind = 1

select
from tbl_lock l,tbl_vehicle c where l.vehicle_id=c.id and is_has_bind = 1 and c.id=#{carId}
select d.device_id from tbl_device d where d.type = 2 and d.is_disallowed=0 and d.is_invalid=0 and d.device_id not in (select l.lock_device_id from tbl_lock l)
select lock_device_id from tbl_lock_binding where vehicle_id = #{carId} and last_valid_time > now()

SELECT * FROM `tbl_lock_status` WHERE
(lock_id = #{lock.id} AND change_time = (SELECT MAX(change_time) FROM `tbl_lock_status` WHERE lock_id = #{lock.id}))

SELECT l.store_id, l.seat, l.seat_index, l.lock_device_id, l.is_allowed_open, l.bind_status, l.is_has_bind, l.lock_index, IFNULL( s.`status`, 0 ) `status` FROM tbl_lock l LEFT JOIN tbl_lock_status s ON l.store_id = s.store_id AND l.seat = s.seat AND l.seat_index = s.seat_index AND l.lock_device_id = s.lock_device_id AND s.change_time = ( SELECT MAX( t.change_time ) FROM tbl_lock_status t WHERE t.store_id = s.store_id AND t.seat = s.seat AND t.seat_index = s.seat_index AND t.lock_device_id = s.lock_device_id ), tbl_vehicle v WHERE l.vehicle_id = v.id AND v.vehicle_number = #{carNumber}
